desc: bamix® has invented and perfected the handheld immersion blenders and food processor that chops, blends, purees, mixes beats and more. we are proud to accompany our customers in the kitchen for a lifetime. No similar product manages to combine so many applications in a single space-saving, easy-to-use clean.

layout.text: Whether you're a novice chef or professional cuisiner, we will match you with the bamix® immersion hand blender that fits your needs and lifestyle best.
